fields.description: DN debits this (outgoing stock); PR credits this (incoming stock). Used when is_bns_internal_customer/supplier.
fields.label: Stock in Transit Account

fields.description: DN uses this account for same-GSTIN internal transfer GL rewrite (sales side).
fields.label: Internal Sales Transfer Account

fields.description: PR uses this account for same-GSTIN internal transfer GL rewrite (purchase side).
fields.label: Internal Purchase Transfer Account

fields.description: SI credits this instead of income account; PI debits this instead of expense account when is_bns_internal.
fields.label: Internal Transfer Account

fields.description: SI debits this (receivable from branch); PI credits this (payable to branch). Net balance = inter-branch position.
fields.label: Internal Branch Debtor Account

fields.description: PR debits this (payable from source branch) when BNS internal DN->PR GL rewrite is applied.
fields.label: Internal Branch Creditor Account

fields.description: Force BNS internal GL rewrite even when strict source checks are partially missing. Use only for controlled recovery.
fields.label: Force BNS Internal GL Rewrite

fields.description: Apply internal linkage validations and mismatch checks only on or after this posting date. Legacy data before this date is ignored.
fields.label: Internal Validation Cutoff Date

fields.description: Auto-generate e-Waybill for Delivery Notes when customer is BNS internal and billing GSTIN equals company GSTIN.
fields.label: Auto e-Waybill for Internal Customer DN
